name: ai-hub-backend
description: AI Hub Backend - API-based MongoDB Storage

scripts.validate:prompts: node -e "const { PromptValidator } = require('./src/prompts/utils'); const validator = new PromptValidator(); validator.validateAll();"
scripts.benchmark:prompts: node -e "const { PromptTester } = require('./src/prompts/utils'); const tester = new PromptTester(); tester.benchmarkPrompt('generateTitle', { content: '테스트' }, 100);"
